applied_job_description:
Position: SAP ABAP Developer
Department: IT & Development
Location: Hybrid/On-site
Experience Level: Mid-Level (2+ years)

Job Summary:
We are seeking an experienced SAP ABAP Developer to join our IT development team. The successful candidate will work closely with functional teams to develop, maintain, and optimize SAP applications while ensuring high-quality technical solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
• Work closely with functional teams to understand business needs
• Evaluate the technical feasibility of requests and estimate workload
• Develop using best ABAP programming practices, including creating programs, reports, function modules, forms, and interfaces
• Create custom SAP applications to meet specific client requirements
• Optimize the performance of ABAP applications by writing efficient code, managing SQL queries, data indexing, and minimizing SAP system load
• Adapt standard SAP modules by modifying parameters, screens, and workflows to align with evolving business needs
• Perform unit tests to verify functionality and reliability of the developed code
• Collaborate with functional teams during integration and user acceptance tests
• Create detailed technical documentation and properly comment code
• Work with IT teams to develop interfaces between SAP and other systems (ETL, BI, CRM, etc.)
• Ensure data consistency and information flow between applications
• Quickly resolve complex technical issues reported by support teams, including debugging and error resolution

Required Skills:
• Engineering degree in Computer Science or equivalent
• Proficient in ABAP and SQL
• At least 2 years in a similar role
• Programming experience within the SAP application
• Professional English: reading, writing, and speaking
• Ability to collect and translate user requirements
• Ability to work according to a specification

Key Competencies:
• Planning and organization / Meeting deadlines
• Time management / Ability to prioritize
• Communication, listening, and interpersonal skills
• Understanding user needs
• Commitment to continuous improvement of internal processes
• Analytical and research skills
• Problem-solving and synthesis skills
• Results-oriented / Persistence in achieving results
• Teamwork and positive attitude

Benefits:
• Competitive salary range: $65,000 - $85,000
• Professional development opportunities
• Technical training and certifications
• Health and dental coverage
• Flexible working arrangements
• Performance-based bonuses
candidate_experience: Multiple years of experience in SAP systems and implementations
candidate_background: Experienced SAP Architect and Technical Expert with a strong background in SAP systems, including S4H, Fiori, ECC6, and SAP HANA Studio. Extensive experience in various industries such as chemical processing, food and beverages, cosmetics, telecommunications, oil and gas, automotive, and trading and distribution.
requirements_analysis: At least 2 years of experience in a similar role
Programming experience within the SAP application
Professional English: reading, writing, and speaking
Ability to collect and translate user requirements
Ability to work according to a specification

match_results.technical_skills: Strong background in SAP systems and technologies, including SAP BI Platform and SAP HANA. Experience implies ABAP knowledge and SQL skills.
match_results.experience_level: More than 2 years of experience in SAP-related roles, exceeding the minimum requirement.
match_results.education: Diplôme National d'ingénieur en Administration Réseaux et Cloud Computing, which is relevant to the role.
match_results.certifications: No specific certifications mentioned, but has relevant technical skills and experience.

strengths: Strong background in SAP systems and technologies
Extensive experience in SAP implementations and configurations
Experience in various industries, indicating adaptability and broad knowledge
gaps: English language proficiency is basic and may not meet the 'Professional English' requirement
No explicit mention of ABAP programming experience, though implied through SAP experience
rationale: The candidate has a strong background in SAP systems and technologies, with extensive experience in implementations and configurations. The education background is relevant, and the candidate has experience in various industries. However, there is a gap in English language proficiency, which is rated as basic. Additionally, while the candidate has experience with SAP systems, there is no explicit mention of ABAP programming experience.
risk: The candidate's basic English proficiency may pose a risk in effectively communicating and working with functional teams and other stakeholders who require professional English skills.
next_steps: Conduct a technical interview to assess the candidate's ABAP programming skills and experience.
Evaluate the candidate's English language proficiency through a language assessment or interview.
Discuss the candidate's experience in SAP development and optimization to understand their depth of knowledge and problem-solving skills.
